items.title: About Me
items.text: Hello! My name is Maryna, I am a professional photographer. I live and work in Kyiv, and I joyfully capture unique moments. I have been engaged in professional photography since 2012 and love every moment when I can capture the beauty of the world and people. My goal is to show the soul of a person in each shot, and I always try to find a unique angle and light to make your photos true masterpieces.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions: How long does it take to receive my photos?
Will I receive copyright for the photos?
Can I get the unedited photos?
What if I need to reschedule the photoshoot?
How should I prepare for the photoshoot?
Can you make my body look smaller in the photos?
What are the best times and days for photoshoots?
Is travel time included in the session?
Can you style my products more creatively?
Do you travel outside the city for shoots?
If I want to shoot at a location with a fee, do you cover these costs?
answers: Usually, photo processing takes from 1 to 2 weeks.
Yes, you will receive copyright for the photos.
Unfortunately, we do not provide unedited photos.
Please contact me in advance to reschedule your photoshoot.
We will provide you with instructions on how to prepare for the photoshoot.
Yes, we can make certain corrections to the photos.
The best time for photoshoots is in the morning and evening.
Yes, travel time is included in the session.
Yes, we can style your products.
Yes, we can travel outside the city for shoots.
Unfortunately, additional costs for the shoot are covered separately.

contacts.title: Order a photo session
contacts.description: Photo session in Liberec and its surroundings, for you and your loved ones
